Your application has been reviewed and approved by the system. You can get a loan at the nearest bank branch.
 To do this, provide the bank employee with the loan identification number (listed below) and your passport details.
 If you have any questions regarding the operation of the service or the procedure for obtaining a loan, please contact:
 Number: +8 800 555 35-35
 Or write to the mail: homemoney@mail.ru
